name: BOSS FIGHTZ
description:
Cecilio wakes up from bed and is planning to go into the city, but instead ends up being forced to fight by an old man. This old man sees Cecilio as the "PERFECT IDIOT" to fight in a tournament where 10 other combatents await. If Ceciclio wants to go home then he must face and defeat all 10 combatents, but can he?

BOSS FIGHTZ is a turn-based first-person rpg where the goal of the game is to fight 10 characters in a 1 on 1 battle and the player can fight all 10 in any order they choose. There are no obstacles in your way to fight any of the bosses except the 10 bosses themselves. 

Note: When fighting the game is in first-person, but when walking around its in third-person. The game can be played on a small window screen, but you have the option to play the game in full screen; however, there will be black bars in that mode. The game can be played with a keyboard and a gamepad and the controls can be changed.
